item.title: Trump says U.S. has carried out another fatal strike targeting alleged drug-smuggling boat
item.description: President Donald Trump said Friday the U.S. military has carried out its third fatal strike against an alleged drug smuggling vessel this month.

item.title: Virginia U.S. attorney resigns after Trump calls for his firing
item.description: Erik Siebert, U.S. attorney for the Eastern District of Virginia, has resigned after President Trump called for his termination.

item.title: Trump unveils $1 million Gold Card for world's wealthiest immigrants

item.title: Trump blames Democrats ahead of looming shutdown, says country 'could be closed'

item.title: CDC advisory panel abandons universal COVID-19 shot recommendation
item.description: A federal advisory panel is no longer endorsing COVID-19 shots for everyone 6 months and older.
